name: Public Baths
description: An establishment offering food, drink, or lodging; adventurers can rest, meet informants, or overhear tavern talk.
atmosphere: The baths have a relaxing, communal atmosphere with the scent of steam and the sound of water and quiet conversation. The air carries the promise of cleanliness and the essential nature of public hygiene, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of social relaxation and the comfort of shared wellness.
